prompt: A majestic octopus-like creature with bioluminescent patterns glowing in a vibrant array of blues and purples. Octavius guards a section of the Great Undersea Reef with its many tentacles wrapped protectively around a bed of rare corals. Tiny exotic marine creatures flock around it as the sunlight filters through the water, creating a mystical, serene glow. Detailed undersea flora and fauna fill the scene, with shimmering fish and intricate coral formations complementing the guardian's presence.
